node.name: BONDI SDK
node.shortdescription:
The BONDI SDK project is an effort to develop and maintain an open source Web SDK for mobile Web widgets based on the BONDI specifications (http://bondi.omtp.org)

The objective of this project is to create an SDK that enables development of Web applications and widgets that can run across all mobile handsets supporting a BONDI-compliant Web runtime.

The BONDI SDK project is being sponsored by the LiMo Foundation (http://www.limofoundation.org)
node.body:
The BONDI SDK project is an effort to develop and maintain an open source Web SDK for mobile Web widgets based on the BONDI specifications (http://bondi.omtp.org)

The objective of this project is to create an SDK that enables development of Web applications and widgets that can run across all mobile handsets supporting a BONDI-compliant Web runtime.

The BONDI SDK project is being sponsored by the LiMo Foundation (http://www.limofoundation.org)
